Title: Roadblocks and Distractions That Steal Your Profits!
Description:
Today we hear from:

•      A business owner who doesn’t feel like delegation is working

•      Dave Ramsey on the labor crisis in America

•      A solopreneur who is struggling to find a marketing breakthrough

•      A business owner wondering what the best banks for small businesses are
